productDes: Burger made of a 100% pure beef patty, onions, pickles and just the right amount of mustard and ketchup wrapped in a caramelized bun.
Grand Cheese burger consists of 1 steak of 100% beef, 1 slice of tomato, lettuce, pieces of Emmental & Cheddar cheeses, crispy onions and cheese sauce in a brioche bun with sesame and poppy seeds.
Grand Cheese burger consists of 1 chicken patty, 1 slice of tomato, lettuce, pieces of Emmental & Cheddar cheeses, crispy onions and cheese sauce in a brioche bun with sesame and poppy seeds.
